post:
Alwyzon: Storage and Performance Servers in Austria with Generous Resources Starting at €2.88/month!

alwyzon, austria, Europe, kvm, storage, storage server March 21, 2021 @ 5:00 pm, by raindog308

A hosting company named Alwyzon?  I see what you did there…well, at least it’s more clever than pounding WHOIS servers for hours trying to find an unregistered domain in the form of (random noun)host.com.  Welcome, Alwyzon!

They’re an Austrian hosting company hosting out of their home country and they’ve got a short-term deal for our reads., including storage servers.  That sounds tasty as I don’t think we’ve seen a storage offer out of Austria before.

Between now and March 24, 2021 at 23:59 CET, you can get:

  • 500G for only €2.88/month if you sign up annually (quarterly also available)
  • 1TB for €4.95/month on annual contract (monthly also available)
  • They’ve also got a 2GB KVM with 100GB of storage and 5TB of bandwidth for only €4.68/month!

These deals use the code HELLOVIENNA to get the discounts shown below.

For one of the more expensive geographies, that’s nice and if you are in that part of Europe and looking for a low-latency connection at a decent price, take a look at Alwyzon.

They are registered as Hohl IT (Austria FN 538746z). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit Cards, BanContact, EPS, giropay, iDEAL and PayPal.

Here’s a little about Alwyzon in their own words:

“Alwyzon is a trading name of Hohl IT e.U., a small software development firm registered in Graz, Austria. All equipment is fully owned, equity financed and runs on our own network in the InterXion VIE1, one of the largest datacenters in Austria and home to the major Austrian internet hub VIX. As a RIPE NCC member, we also own all IPs assigned to any client and currently operate the equivalent of a /21 IPv4 subnet to offer our services.“

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
